thread.title: Wonderful Location with Great Staff
thread.title_full: Wonderful Location with Great Staff - Review of Viceroy Central Park New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Luxgurl75
title: Wonderful Location with Great Staff
text: This hotel is very small but location is everything in NYC. It's just a short walk to the park, 5th ave, times square, museums, transit, etc. The staff are also so helpful and kind from the front desk to the concierge to the bellman. I was not a fan of the shower (with no door) and did not care for the soap line either from the smell to the texture. The coffee maker was not easy to operate either... especially at 5am when you are groggy. We had a small issue with the door in our room and they took care of it in a split second. All in all, it was a pleasant stay and we also enjoyed the restaurant in the hotel too.
